name: Technocow Roundup
description:
A game made for 2022's Lost Relic Games Game Jam which took place from June 11th to June 19th around the theme "connections".

The Game

A 2D platformer set to a space-western theme. Your goal is to use your space-age lasso to traverse the levels and combat space-age android cows.

The cows' AI routines are on the fritz and they are not friendly. The combat is tough, and your lasso can't influence the cows directly. Make connections between the cows and the environment to cause some damage. Checkpointing is very liberal. You won't need to repeat any combat encounters unless you go back through the level. 

Tips

If the combat is more challenging than you like, you can adjust your starting health using up/down arrow keys at any time. 

Platforms:

Windows

Credits:

All code and art by me.
